Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians have been listed as -141 moneyline favorites for the matchup against the Astros (+121).
The total for the matchup has been set at 7.5 runs.
Guardians Recent Stats: The Guardians have a record of 5-5 in their last 10 games.
The Guardians are averaging 3.6 runs per game, with 14 home runs and an ERA of 2.20 over their last 10 games.
José Ramírez leads the team with a.292 batting average, 39 home runs, and 118 RBIs.
Astros Recent Stats: The Astros have a record of 6-4 in their last 10 games.

Yordan Alvarez leads the team with a.308 batting average, 35 home runs, and 86 RBIs.
Others: The game will be played at Progressive Field in Cleveland, Ohio, and will be broadcast on BSGL.
